original_text: Elisha said, ‘This is what the Lord says: Dig many holes in this dry valley, 17 because the Lord says this: You will not see any wind or any rain. But this valley will become full of water! You, your cows and your other animals will have water to drink.
korean_text: 그가 이르되 여호와의 말씀이 이 골짜기에 개천을 많이 파라 하셨나이다

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord says
Dig many holes in this dry valley
sentences.korean_translation: 이 마른 골짜기에 많은 구덩이를 파라

sentences.original_text: You will not see any wind
But this valley will become full of water
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이 골짜기는 물로 가득 찰 것이다

sentences.original_text: You will have water to drink
Your cows and your other animals
